attributes.title: a joke just like him
attributes.review: HORRIBLE APP it took a week to download then hacked into my phone and texted all my contacts and released my social security number. like this app is dangerous to many people and also killed like one bc it’s just that dumb get this wack person out of office. honestly i don’t know how the world hasn’t exploded in these entire four years anyway arrest the cops who murdered breonna taylor and reform the government. have a blessed day and TAKE THIS APP OFF THE APP STORE❤️

attributes.title: Upset 😔✋
attributes.review: I was very disappointed by this app 😿 I started downloading it 3 weeks ago and it just today finally downloaded 🥺 I was hoping to open up this app to find the words of wisdom from our wonderful✨Cheeto puff✨ but instead I opened it to find trump’s full nude collection 🙀 I was literally shocked  👁👄👁 I just wanted to learn about the 🍊and instead I learned about his croissant dick 🥐🍆 I wanted a campaign not an only fans 😾unsolicited peepee pics aren’t cool Donny 🤡

attributes.title: Gen Z protesting
attributes.review: The only 1 stars on here are because ppl are mad that their “beloved” Tiktok is being taken down. There’s nothing wrong with this app, they need to quit their whining and get a mind. Cuz clearly they left it at home along with their common sense.

attributes.title: Makes me contemplate whether or not to live
attributes.review: This app is the absolute worst. In my time of app testing, this one is the worst one ever. It doesn’t make any sense. I am CONVINCED that there are spies running this app and taking all of our information. It is stinky like Donald himself. They both need a shower and cleanse themselves of this monstrosity. If -100 stars was an option, that would be what I’d pick🤢🤢 Never use again and suggests that everyone does the same.

attributes.title: My ferret jumped in a toaster thanks...
attributes.review: I was so excited to support our supreme leader so I decided to download this app to further my knowledge about political stuffs when the app started to break down 😌 now whenever I try to open the app my phone glitches so I guess I also have a virus so thanks🙄 not to mention the other problems I’m having... I tried to show my ferrets our cheeto god and they jumped in the toaster. Honestly I’m very disappointed....

attributes.title: Please do not download!!!
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app since I was interested to see what “our president” was up to, and, well, I opened the app and immediately puked in my grandmother’s purse. The first thing you see is this creature, kinda looks like an orange but also looks like a Cheeto. I didn’t even know things like it existed on our Earth. I’m warning you, please DO NOT download this app, you will NOT be able to recover from the Orange-Cheeto Hybrid thing that appears.

attributes.title: Tiktok😘
attributes.review: So Donald Trump wanted to take tiktok downI’m going to take his app down because that is disrespectful because I have nothing better to do other than be on Tiktok and now he wants to remove it I’m gonna remove his app now I wanna see if he gets angry I want to see his anger I’m coming for you Donald Trump and that’s on PeriodT I don’t like this president at all and this is just my opinion if you don’t like it don’t like it because he’s taking a TikTok away from me

attributes.title: 🧚🏽Very Bad🧚🏽

I guess the wonderful 🌟 trumpkin 🌟 doesn’t know how to develop a good app. I wouldn’t suggest downloading this app unless you want a virus bigger that the one we have and I’m not talking about corona. This app has terrible updates takes forever to load and doesn’t work half the time

attributes.title: ❤️tiktok❤️
attributes.review: EW JUST EW when i opened the app i  saw an 🍊orange🍊 help my eyes hurt so badly and now my parents are gonna ground. but before they do i just wanted to say that i saw things i should not have and then i saw trumps 🍤no no square🍤and then while i was in the app some random things saying 🙄ᴛʀᴜᴍᴘ 2020🙄started going in my room so i had to ask my mom for a 💫𝑡ℎ𝑒𝑟𝑎𝑝𝑖𝑠𝑡💫 and now im headed to the doctor❤️ so now ima just-hold up ima go put bleach in my eyes and take my fish on a walk:)

attributes.title: wow
attributes.review: i downloaded this app a week ago and ever since my phone has been turning on siri without my command and she has been yelling racial slurs and very inappropriate things to me. i had to take my phone to the apple store to try and fix but they said there was nothing they could do, however, once i told them this started after i downloaded the trump app, they told me this was a common problem customers had in relation to the app. i went home and just before i deleted it, my phone made these horrible screeching noises. i had to throw my phone in the toilet to get it to shut up. somebody, i’m hoping donald trump, will reimburse me for the destruction of my phone, if he can finally own up to his mistakes. 😡
